summary:
Still, of course, I'd never dared to leave the room for an instant,
 for I was not sure when he might come, and the billet was such a good one and suited me so well
 that I would not risk the loss of it. As he glanced down the advertisement column with his head thrust forward,
 and the paper flattened out upon his knee, I took a good look at the man, and endeavoured
 after the fashion of my companion to read the indications which might be presented by his
 dress or appearance.
